survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Work Model Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and experience with the hybrid work model, including aspects of productivity, work-life balance, and technology support.

questions.question_text: How often do you work remotely under the hybrid work model?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible remote work frequencies.
